SEARCH
Package me.squidxtv.frameui.core

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
me.squidxtv.frameui.core.Screen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clickable, Scrollable
public class Screen extends Object implements Clickable, Scrollable
The Screen is a 2d plane of multiple ItemFrame instances in the Minecraft World. Together they make up a bigger image. Each ItemFrame hold a MapItem that display a custom image which is limited to 128x128 pixels.

    The State represents the possible states of a screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • Screen

      public Screen(Plugin plugin, int width, int height, ScreenLocation location, ScreenSpawner spawner, Renderer renderer)
      Creates a new screen with the specified plugin, dimensions, location, spawner and renderer.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin associated with this screen
      width - the block width of the screen
      height - the block height of the screen
      location - the location of the screen
      spawner - the spawner responsible for spawning the screen's item frames
      renderer - the renderer responsible for rendering the screen's content
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if plugin, location, spawner, or renderer is null

    • Screen

      public Screen(Plugin plugin, int width, int height, ScreenLocation location, BufferedImage image)
      Creates a new screen with the specified plugin, dimensions and location. Uses packets for spawning and a BufferedImage for rendering.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin associated with this screen
      width - the block width of the screen
      height - the block height of the screen
      location - the location of the screen
      image - the image rendered on the image
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if plugin, location or image is null

    • Screen

      public Screen(Plugin plugin, int width, int height, ScreenLocation location)
      Creates a new screen with the specified plugin, dimensions and location. Uses packets for spawning and a default image for rendering.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin associated with this screen
      width - the block width of the screen
      height - the block height of the screen
      location - the location of the screen
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if plugin or location is null
